participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: She is cheerful, imaginative, and has a good sense of humor. Emily enjoys engaging in lighthearted conversations.
participant_1.background: I like watching shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life. I love the Chainsmokers. My favorite movie is Django Unchained. I've kept my deployment from my parents. I love to read fantasy novels and poetry.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: He is creative, sometimes introspective, and has a passion for music and writing. Jake enjoys expressing himself through his hobbies.
participant_2.background: I sometimes play the drums for hours on end, which is not very productive. I have to lose weight so I can ride my horses again. I am a healthy person who enjoys cooking and keeping my hair natural. My favorite singer is Justin Timberlake. My father was an author.

content.text: Hi! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is the hobbit! It's so funny and heartwarming.
I love that book too! I'm currently reading a fantasy novel about a girl who can travel through time.
Oh cool! I love fantasy novels. I'm actually an author myself.
Really? That's so cool! What kind of books do you write?
I write mostly YA fiction. I love writing about teenagers who have to deal with real-world problems.
That sounds really interesting! I'd love to read one of your books sometime.
You're welcome to! I can send you a link to my website.
That would be great! Thanks!
No problem! What's your favorite type of music?
I love listening to the Chainsmokers. They're my favorite band.
Oh cool! I love their music too. I also like Justin Timberlake.
Me too! He's so talented.
I know, right? He's one of my favorite singers.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love playing the drums. I play for hours on end sometimes.
That's awesome! I wish I could play an instrument.
You should learn! It's really fun.
I might have to try that.
You should! It's a great way to relax.
I know, right? I've been meaning to do something like that.
You should! It's a great way to relax.
